Class SequenceNode

This composite node it's going to execute all it's children from left to right and stop when one fails, if all children nodes succeds this composite succeds, if even one Children fails this composite it's going to fail.

Execute()

Called when the behavior tree wants to execute this node. Put here all the code you want this node to execute.

Declaration
protected override ENodeState Execute()
Returns
Type Description
ENodeState

SUCCESS if this node has been executed successfully, RUNNING if is still executing and FAILED if the node has failed to execute it's tasks.
